description: Initial members of prime triples (p, p+4, p+6).
comments: Subsequence of A023200. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 15 2013All terms are congruent to 1 (modulo 6). - _Matt C. Anderson_, May 22 2015
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Triplet.
mathematica: Select[Table[Prime[n], {n, 2000}], PrimeQ[# + 4] && PrimeQ[# + 6] &] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jun 19 2011 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(10000) | IsPrime(p+4) and IsPrime(p+6)]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 23 2015
author: _Warut Roonguthai_
